title: Digital Literacy-Based EFL Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational English Language Education Experience and Basic Digital Tool Usage
context.additional_context: Corporate elementary English education managers/leaders require enhanced competency in designing effective digital media-integrated teaching methods within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can propose lesson design plans utilizing smartphone-based digital tools (quiz apps, video editing tools, etc.) in EFL classroom settings
Learners can analyze the appropriateness of English educational materials by applying a digital literacy evaluation framework
Learners can establish a digital educational resource-sharing system among teachers through LMS-based collaborative task design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
